title: Minute and second of arc
summary: A minute of arc, arcminute (arcmin), arc minute, or minute arc, denoted by the symbol ′, is a unit of angular measurement equal to 1/60 of one degree.[1] Since one degree is 1/360 of a turn (or complete rotation), one minute of arc is 1/21600 of a turn. The nautical mile (nmi) was originally defined as a minute of latitude on a spherical Earth, so the actual Earth circumference is very near 21600 nmi.  A minute of arc is π/10800 of a radian.
